message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise while still allowing me to stay within my financial limits.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but $950,000 is significantly below what I believe the product is worth.  I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle at $1,025,000?

I understand Alice, but given my current budget, I am unable to meet at $1,025,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000. This price aligns better with my financial constraints while still recognizing the value of the product.
